title: Everyday should be commemorated as Women’s Day: Shivraj Singh Chouhan
title_page: Everyday should be commemorated as Women’s Day: Shivraj Singh ChouhanBiharprabha News | Biharprabha News
text:
Bhopal, Mar 08 (ANI): Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan on Tuesday held a road march to commemorate International Women’s Day. Speaking on the occasion, he said everyday should be celebrated as Women’s Day. Expressing happiness, Chouhan said the state government would provide women and girls reservation in all schools and offices for their empowerment. Chouhan added his government would launch many new policies to improve the condition of women in Madhya Pradesh.
